title: Myths of the World 9 - Island of Forgotten Evil CE [ASG]
description:
[color=red][b]No Need For Patches Or Serials Just Run Installer And Enjoy The Game![/b][/color] 

Eipix proudly presents the newest addition to the Myths of the World series!

Before his death, your uncle hid a mysterious artifact that only you could find. What starts as a search for the truth quickly turns into the adventure of a lifetime when a ghostly apparition tries to thwart your plans! Can you break the curse of the Legionary before itâ€™s too late, or will you be its next victim? Find out in this riveting hidden-object puzzle adventure!

The Collectorâ€™s Edition Features:
Close the gates to the Underworld in the bonus game!
Find signs hidden throughout the game!
Collect souvenirs to fill the Souvenir Room.
Earn achievements for your otherworldly game play!
Save your mythic memories with posters, wallpapers, concept art, and music.

[b]System Requirements:[/b] 
OS: Windows XP/Vista/Win7/Win8/Win10
CPU: 2 GHz RAM: 1024 MB 
DirectX: 9.0 
Hard Drive: 1 GB
